medium: Pen and brown ink and brown wash, squared in black chalk; laid down
title: Judith Beheading Holofernes
marks:
Stamp and Inscription

Inscribed on recto of mou
description: laid down on moutn with black, tan and gray framing lines; figure at center pulls back drapery to reveal scene of Judith with sword raised, holding struggling Holofernes, lying on bed, by the hair; soldiers at left; squared off in a grid
